LearningSummaryData.title: Learn how to become a

LearningSummaryData.description: As a graduate, you’ll leave with a solid base of fundamental programming and computer science knowledge, as well as experience with languages, frameworks, and libraries that employers demand.

CoursesData.title: Javascript Full Stack Web and Mobile Development
CoursesData.description: We will start from the ground up by learning how to implement modern web pages with HTML and CSS.
CoursesData.courseSummary: In this course, we will learn the basic tools that every web page coder needs to know we will start from the ground up by learning how to implement modern web pages with HTML and CSS. We will then advance to learning how to code our pages such that its components rearrange and resize themselves automatically based on the size of the users screen. You will be able to code up a web page that will be just as useful on a mobile phone as on a desktop computer. No pinch and zoom required. Last ut certainly not least, we will get a thorough introduction to the most ubiquitous, popular, and incredibly powerful language of the web: Javascript. Using Javascript, you will be able to build a fully functional web application that utilizesAjax to expose server-side functionality and data to the end user. We will also develop mobile applications using React-Native.

HowToStartData.title: How can you start?
HowToStartData.subTitle: Register yourself now and get real employable skills that top companies want
HowToStartData.bannerSubTitle: Choose a start date and register on this page to secure your spot. To prepare for the Bootcamp, get the pre-course materials. If you have no prior experience with JavaScript, HTML, or CSS, we estimate it will take you 20-30 hours

cardData.title: Learn full-stack from the comfort of your own home
cardData.content: Get access to all of the course's core contents, including both text and video lessons.  Begin learning at your own pace from the first day of the Bootcamp, extending the course duration as needed.

cardData.title: Personal 1:1 sessions with mentors
cardData.content: Schedule weekly 1:1 appointments with your mentor to work through any current challenges, obtain additional explanations, and ask any concerns you may have.

cardData.title: For code-related questions, there is a support platform
cardData.content: The curriculum, projects, exercises, and outcomes are identical to the boot camp's in-person version.

cardData.title: Flexible schedule Completely
cardData.content: We provide support via a support portal, chat, and provide comments on your progress.

WhySectionData.title: Why Javascript?
cards: JavaScript has been the most popular language in the world for 9 years in a row, according to StackOverflow.com, the largest community website for professional and enthusiast programmers.
Knowing JavaScript allows you to design Web and mobile apps without any restrictions. JavaScript can be used to create back-end, front-end, full-stack, iOS, and Android apps.
The most in-demand position on the job market is full-stack developer.

WhatStandsOutData.title: What Stands Us Out
WhatStandsOutData.subTitle: Register yourself now and get real employable skills that top companies want

cardData.title: Build skills for a new career
cardData.content: We start with the languages that you'll need most to work : JavaScript, Express JS and more...

cardData.title: Match-up with an employers
cardData.content: Our students' skills are in demand so we have employment partners over the globe. We work hard to find a place that suits you.

cardData.title: We’re here to support you
cardData.content: We offer 24-hour weekday support plus help throughout the weekend, a student care package, individual career support, mentoring and more…

cardData.title: We know your strengths
cardData.content: We monitor your progress with our custom software so we can support you exactly where you need it.

FAQs.title: What is the refund policy?
FAQs.content: If you subscribed, you get a 7-day free trial during which you can cancel at no penalty. After that, we don’t give refunds, but you can cancel your subscription at any time.

FAQs.title: Can I just enroll in a single course?
FAQs.content: Yes! To get started, click the course card that interests you and enroll. You can enroll and complete the course to earn a shareable certificate.

FAQs.title: Is financial aid available?
FAQs.content: No, Codify college does not presently provide financial aid to learners who cannot afford the fee.

FAQs.title: Is this course really with live Mentoring and online? Do I need to attend any classes in person?
FAQs.content: This course is entirely with live Mentoring and online, where you will book your live mentoring sessions in the platform calendar. You can access your lectures, recorded videos, and assignments via  web or mobile.

FAQs.title: Do I get a certificate after completion of the course?
FAQs.content: Yes, you will receive a certificate of graduation from the course once you pass the project.

FAQs.title: What background knowledge is necessary?
FAQs.content: No prerequisite knowledge is needed as our course is designed to take you from ground zero up.

FAQs.title: Do I need to take the courses in a specific order?
FAQs.content: Ideally, learners should complete the courses in the specified sequence. However, if you are already comfortable in some languages you may choose to skip the lesson which we strongly discourage.

StudentReviewData.title: Reviews By Students
StudentReviewData.subTitle: Most of our graduates were employed after 6 months upon graduation

CareerSupportData.title: What Stands Us Out
CareerSupportData.subTitle: Register yourself now and get real employable skills that top companies want

TuitionData.title: Tuition
TuitionData.subTitle: We conduct discount programs from time to time, so the price may be lower
content: Interest-free payment option of 5-6 months Alternatively, you may sign up for up to 36 months with Klarna, which includes complete access to the materials for 6 months and 9-15 weeks of mentor assistance, which includes access to the support platform, 1:1 sessions, and our Slack chat group.

If you require additional time and mentor help to complete the bootcamp, you may extend it on a weekly basis for 99€ each week, allowing you to study at your own speed while still receiving all of the support and direction we give.
As a result, you may finish the bootcamp according to your schedule and learning pace – from a full-time intense 3-6 months to a longer period, just as we do with our in-person group on campus.
